function.name: Defeated
function.DescriptionEN: Kills the ancient, etc.
function.DescriptionCN: 摧毁遗迹等

function.name: DidMatchSignoutTimeOut
function.DescriptionEN: true when we have waited some time after end of the game and not received signout
function.DescriptionCN: 当游戏结束，等待弹窗时为真

function.name: GetCustomGameDifficulty
function.DescriptionEN: Returns the difficulty level of the custom game mode
function.DescriptionCN: 返回自定义游戏模式难度

function.name: GetDifficulty
function.DescriptionEN: Returns difficulty level of the custom game mode
function.DescriptionCN: 返回自定义游戏模式难度

function.name: GetDroppedItem
function.DescriptionEN: Gets the Xth dropped item
function.DescriptionCN: 获得第X个掉落物品

function.name: GetGameModeEntity
function.DescriptionEN: Get the game mode entity
function.DescriptionCN: 设置游戏模式实体

function.name: GetGameTime
function.DescriptionEN: Returns the number of seconds elapsed since map start. This time doesn't count up when the game is paused
function.DescriptionCN: 返回游戏开始后经过的秒数，暂停时间不计算在内

function.name: GetMatchSignoutComplete
function.DescriptionEN: Have we received the post match signout message that includes reward information
function.DescriptionCN: 是否已经接受包含回报信息的弹窗

function.name: GetNianFightStartTime
function.DescriptionEN: Gets the start time for the Nian fight
function.DescriptionCN: 获得年兽大战开始时间

function.name: GetNianTotalDamageTaken
function.DescriptionEN: For New Bloom, get total damage taken by the Nian / Year Beast
function.DescriptionCN: 芳晓活动，获得年兽受到的总伤害

function.name: GetTimeOfDay
function.DescriptionEN: Get the time of day
function.DescriptionCN: 获取一天中的时间（游戏时间）

function.name: IsDaytime
function.DescriptionEN: Is it day time.
function.DescriptionCN: 是否是白天

function.name: MakeTeamLose
function.DescriptionEN: Makes ths specified team lose
function.DescriptionCN: 使指定队伍失败

function.name: NumDroppedItems
function.DescriptionEN: Returns the number of items currently dropped on the ground
function.DescriptionCN: 返回当前掉落在地面的物品数量

function.name: Playtesting_UpdateAddOnKeyValues
function.DescriptionEN: Updates custom hero, unit and ability KeyValues in memory with the latest values from disk
function.DescriptionCN: 从磁盘数据中更新自定义英雄、单位、技能的键值

function.name: ResetDefeated
function.DescriptionEN: Restart after killing the ancient, etc.
function.DescriptionCN: 遗迹摧毁后重新开始

function.name: ResetToHeroSelection
function.DescriptionEN: Restart the game at hero selection
function.DescriptionCN: 重新开始时选择英雄

function.name: SendCustomMessage
function.signature: void SendCustomMessage(string message, int teamID, int unknown(1?))
function.DescriptionEN:
Displays a line of text in the left textbox (where usually deaths/denies/buysbacks are announced). This function takes restricted HTML as input! (
,,)
function.DescriptionCN:
在左侧文本框显示一行文本，通常用来提示死亡、反补队友、买活等信息。使用严格HTML格式(
,,)

HowToCall.Parameter: string message, int teamID, int unknown(1?

function.name: SetCreepMinimapIconScale
function.DescriptionEN: Scale the creep icons on the minimap.
function.DescriptionCN: 在小地图上缩放中立生物图标

function.name: SetCustomGameDifficulty
function.DescriptionEN: Set the difficulty level of the custom game mode
function.DescriptionCN: 设置自定义游戏模式难度等级

function.name: SetFirstBloodActive
function.DescriptionEN: Sets whether First Blood has been triggered.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置第一滴血是否已经产生

function.name: SetGameWinner
function.DescriptionEN: Makes ths specified team win
function.DescriptionCN: 使指定队伍胜利

function.name: SetGoldPerTick
function.DescriptionEN: Set the auto gold increase per timed interval.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置每个时间间隔获得的金币

function.name: SetGoldTickTime
function.DescriptionEN: Set the time?interval between auto gold increases.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置获得金币的时间周期

function.name: SetHeroMinimapIconSize
function.DescriptionEN: (nMinimapHeroIconSize) - Set the hero minimap icon size.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置小地图英雄图标尺寸

function.name: SetHeroRespawnEnabled
function.DescriptionEN: Control if the normal DOTA hero respawn rules apply.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置是否使用默认英雄复活规则

function.name: SetHeroSelectionTime
function.DescriptionEN: Sets the amount of time players have to pick their hero.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置选择英雄的时间

function.name: SetNianFightStartTime
function.DescriptionEN: Sets the start time for the Nian fight
function.DescriptionCN: 设置年兽大战开始时间

function.name: SetOverlayHealthBarUnit
function.DescriptionEN: Show this unit's health on the overlay health bar
function.DescriptionCN: 在前端蒙版生命条上显示单位生命值

function.name: SetPostGameTime
function.DescriptionEN: Sets the amount of time players have between the game ending and the server disconnecting them.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置在结束游戏后服务器与玩家断线前的时间

function.name: SetPreGameTime
function.DescriptionEN: Sets the amount of time players have between picking their hero and game start.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置选择英雄与开始游戏之间的时间

function.name: SetRuneMinimapIconScale
function.DescriptionEN: Scale the rune icons on the minimap.
function.DescriptionCN: 缩放小地图神符图标

function.name: SetRuneSpawnTime
function.DescriptionEN: Sets the amount of time between rune spawns.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置神符刷新时间

function.name: SetSafeToLeave
function.DescriptionEN: Mark this game as safe to leave.
function.DescriptionCN: 标记游戏可安全离开

function.name: SetSameHeroSelectionEnabled
function.DescriptionEN: When true, players can repeatedly pick the same hero.
function.DescriptionCN: 允许选择重复英雄

function.name: SetTimeOfDay
function.DescriptionEN: Set the time of day.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置一天中的时间（游戏时间）

function.name: SetTreeRegrowTime
function.DescriptionEN: Sets the tree regrow time in seconds.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置树重新生长的时间（秒）

function.name: SetUseBaseGoldBountyOnHeroes
function.DescriptionEN: Heroes will use the basic NPC functionality for determining their bounty, rather than DOTA specific formulas.
function.DescriptionCN: 英雄将使用基础NPC规则来决定赏金，而不是DOTA指定规则

function.name: SetUseCustomHeroXPValues
function.DescriptionEN: Allows heroes in the map to give a specific amount of XP (this value must be set).
function.DescriptionCN: 允许英雄提供指定数目的经验值（必须先设置）

function.name: SetUseUniversalShopMode
function.DescriptionEN: When true, all items are available at as long as any shop is in range, including Secret Shop items
function.DescriptionCN: 为真时，所有物品当处于任意商店范围内时都能购买到，包括秘密商店物品

function.name: State_Get
function.DescriptionEN: Get the current Gamerules state
function.DescriptionCN: 获取当前游戏规则状态
